News.headline: Match Preview: Jordan Maguire-Drew On The Worthing Fixture
News.page_title: Match Preview: Jordan Maguire-Drew On The Worthing Fixture
News.URL_keywords: Match Preview: Jordan Maguire-Drew On The Worthing Fixture
News.short_description: Jordan Maguire-Drew previews the game this Saturday and gives his thoughts on playing his former club Worthing
News.description:
"Training has been sharp this week, we have had a lot of injuries so a rest during the week was well needed and now we are looking forward to the game on Saturday.

Obviously with the FA Trophy it is a chance to get to Wembley and that is a big thing for the club as you are able to make a lot of money from the tournament.

I am looking forward to Saturday as I will be playing my old team, which was a good time for me. I was out for four months last year and went on loan to Worthing for the end of the season, done well and managed to get some goals.

We play with a freedom and I don’t think we should fear any team we play, we always find little gaps and play good balls in behind the defence and always create a lot of chances and our forward players are unbelievable and our back four and midfielders and strong and solid as well.

It was a good result for the team last week as it breaks up the little blip we had at home and I am sure we will put it right Saturday and then start to push on.

Corey Whitely can draw defenders in to him and then that creates space out wide for myself and he always makes good runs in behind and I think me and him have a good partnership together.

I am happy and settled here and I want to stay, but we will have to see what happens come January, I want to concentrate on my football but my aim is to help get the club back into the Football League as it is a great club."
